body.name: Cnkaite 4K Webcam, HD Autofocus Webcam with Microphone, Adjustable Light Computer Camera with Privacy Cover and Tripod Stand, Plug and Play USB Webcam for Laptop Desktop Video Calling
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 21 hrs 42 mins
features: 【Ultra HD 4K Webcam with Auto Focus】The Cnkaite webcam for laptop comes with high definition 3840*2160 resolution at up to 30 frames per second (fps) refresh rate, and a computer camera with microphone for desktop enhanced autofocus helps to capture videos that are as accurate and true-to-life as possible, look your best and enjoy a professional video experience wherever you are.

【Adjustable Ring Fills Light】The Cnkaite Webcam for pc has a built-in adjustable monochrome light that offers lighting compensation at different levels with control. Web camera for monitor also has low-light boost, color boost and adjust exposure so you look your best, even in dim and harsh lighting. PS：If you want better lighting effects, you need to purchase additional professional lighting equipment.

【Webcam with Microphone &90 Degrees Wide View】The web camera is a built-in noise-canceling microphone that reduces ambient noise to enhance the sound quality of your video. Even in noisy surroundings, you can capture just the sounds that you want. The 90° wide-angle lens of the pc camera webcam can accommodate more participants.

【Plug-and-Play &Three Ways to Use】No driver required. Cnkaite USB webcam can be used without drivers to realize plug and play for saving you trouble. Ready to use in one minute or less with any compatible device. Plus, thanks to its convenient mounting clip, you can easily place the webcam on any monitor, laptop, TV, or tripod.

【Wide Compatibility】Webcam for laptop is compatible with Windows 7/8/10, Mac system, Linux. The compatibility of the streaming camera is super wide for major software like Zoom, Tik Tok, Skype, YouTube, and more. We have configured a privacy cover to help you protect your privacy perfectly。 Whether this pc camera is used for online studying/ teaching, home office, conferences, or video calling, the webcam for Mac is perfectly suitable for you.

【About Microphone Adjustment】If the microphone is very low or noisy, you can follow the steps below to improve the sound quality of the microphone. Select Start > Settings > System > Sound > Input > Select Sound Input Device > 4K Webcam as the default sound input device. Click speakers properties and adjust the microphone volume levels to around 1/3. (The webcam microphone sensitivity is very high, maximum volume is generally unnecessary)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried more expensive webcams but they all seemed to be just ok. I work from home in my basement without much natural light so my video quality on Teams and Zoom calls tend to be either washed out or dark. I saw this camera with the built in light and I thought I would give it a try. When I first installed the camera and used it in a Teams meeting I received several comments about how crisp and clear my video was coming through. I think the built in adjustable light has alot to do with it as my background is no longer dark and I don't have to try an overcompensate with overhead lighting. This is a very good camera for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and adjust angles. Good picture quality. Build-in adjustable light certainly helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought one first and loved the quality that I just purchased a second one. I have older laptops and their cameras are not that good. Also, sometimes is hard to position a laptop built in camera. This camera works great! It has a strong clamp, can be positioned where you want it, it has a pretty good lighting and it's really good quality. If it.works great with an older laptop, I'm sure it would work even better with an updated system. I definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Great, But at least the Light Works
reviews.reviewText: Honestly did not love the quality of this camera. The light was fine, functioned as expected. The image quality was extremely grainy, would need a lot of lighting assistance, even with the attached one included. Very limited wiggle room to adjust the image as well. I personally did not test the mic, so I cannot comment on that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply Best Deal for the price.
reviews.reviewText: -It works well. For the price it's just the best deal.-Installation is super simple - it's just plug and play.-I got it to look a little more professional/involved on camera for work and fellowship meetings and I love it.GET IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup, nice quality video
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this camera a few months ago and have really enjoyed using it. My laptop has a built in camera but the angle isn't the greatest - I clip this one on top of my monitor which positions the camera at a more flattering angle. It was really easy to set up and easy to make adjustments to mirroring and other settings. I definitely feel I'm getting a great value for the low cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Really 4K but still Okay to use
reviews.reviewText: So I got it today as of writing this and the webcam itself isn't 4K, no where NEAR actual 4K.However I will say for the the camera that it is it does work fairly well with certain things, mainly if you have a Vtuber model and need something for the tracking this actually tracks your face pretty well and the built in light does help with the face tracking as well.If you want a first budget webcam and you don't really care about it being blurry and laggy then this one will do the job Just one thing,DON'T. USE. IT'S. MIC. (It no good)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality for price
reviews.reviewText: Good picture. I don't use the sound capabilities but connects easily to my work computer. Only complaint is I have two taller monitors and for where I want to put it, there's no space due to my set up. Thats not their fault but if it were smaller and compact, maybe I could have the ideal set up where I can work on other things while looking like I'm paying attention during meetings that should have been an email.
